field.name: summary
field.value: Forum is Jacked, Captha doesn't display 2rd's time takes 10 trys to post.

field.name: description
field.value: Captcha on the forum seems to be jacked. Took me 10 trys to enter in a correct Capcha. 2rd's of the time nothing displays.

comment.author: jonorossi
comment.text: I am closing this with a won't fix resolution because the users mailing list should be used instead of the obsolete forum.

comment.author: jonorossi
comment.text: * '''Resolution''' set to ''Won't Fix''. * '''Status''' changed from ''Open'' to ''Resolved''.
